text: Man xaqꞌij ta aceite rech olivo pa nujolom7:46 Jun ulaꞌ are kopan cho jun ja kꞌolibꞌal che taq ri qꞌij ri kachꞌaj ri raqan, katzꞌumaxik. Kꞌa te riꞌ kaqꞌij aceite re oliva pa ujolom are riꞌ kaqꞌalajisanik chi kaloqꞌaxik. are xinok loq, are kꞌu we ixoq riꞌ xuqꞌij kꞌokꞌ laj kunabꞌal chirij ri waqan.
